sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Three abstractors:

nu creates → ?
du'u creates → ?
ka creates → ?

(Answers: events, propositions, properties)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
krefu x1 recurs at time x2 recur/repeat
rapli x1 repeats/does again x2 repeat

Nested Abstractions

You can put abstractions inside other abstractions:

mi djuno lo du'u do djica lo nu klama

I know [that you want [to go]].

mi pacna lo nu do snada lo nu gunka

I hope [you succeed [at working]].

Choosing the Right Abstractor

Outer Verb Takes Example
djuno du'u mi djuno lo du'u ...
djica nu mi djica lo nu ...
cfari nu mi cfari lo nu ...
nelci ka/nu mi nelci lo ka ...

Complex Examples

mi djuno lo du'u la .bob. cu djica lo nu klama

I know that Bob wants to go.

mi terpa lo nu fliba lo nu snada

I fear failing to succeed.

mi pacna lo nu do jimpe lo du'u ti vajni

I hope you understand that this is important.

Key Point

Match the abstractor to the verb. Nest abstractions for complex meanings.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Nest Abstractions

Translate:

  1. I know that you want to go.
  2. I hope you begin to work.
  3. I fear that I will fail.
Answers
  1. mi djuno lo du'u do djica lo nu klama
  2. mi pacna lo nu do cfari lo nu gunka
  3. mi terpa lo nu mi fliba

Exercise 2: Choose Abstractor

Fill in the right abstractor:

  1. mi djuno lo ___ do klama (know that)
  2. mi djica lo ___ citka (want to)
  3. mi nelci lo ___ melbi (like the quality of)
Answers
  1. du'u
  2. nu
  3. ka

Exercise 3: New Vocabulary

Translate:

  1. This recurs.
  2. I repeat the action.
  3. I know this will recur.
Answers
  1. ti krefu
  2. mi rapli lo nu zukte
  3. mi djuno lo du'u ti ba krefu

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I know you want to go." → mi djuno lo du'u do djica lo nu klama
  2. "I hope you succeed." → mi pacna lo nu do snada
  3. "This repeats." → ti krefu

Summary

You practiced nesting abstractions. Match the abstractor to the verb and build complex meanings.
